definition: To display or exhibit something to an audience or group of people, often in a formal or organized manner, with the intention of showcasing or introducing it. This word is commonly used in the context of presenting or demonstrating a product, idea, or information to others.

examples.german: Er präsentiert stolz seine neueste Erfindung.
examples.english: He proudly presents his latest invention.

examples.german: Die Schüler präsentieren ihre Projekte vor der Klasse.
examples.english: The students present their projects in front of the class.

examples.german: Sie präsentiert die Ergebnisse ihrer Forschung auf einer Konferenz.
examples.english: She presents the results of her research at a conference.

examples.german: Der Moderator präsentiert die Gewinner der Preisverleihung.
examples.english: The host presents the winners of the award ceremony.
